DESCRIPTION: Code to represent the day of the week [1 is Monday and 7 is Sunday]
The time duration elapsed between departure from the origin airport gate and wheels off [min]
The time point that the aircraft's wheels leave the ground [hhmm]
The time spent in the air [minutes]
The distance between the two airports [probably in miles]
The time point that the aircraft's wheels touch on the ground [hhmm]
The time duration elapsed between wheels-on and gate arrival at the destination airport [minutes]
Reason for cancellation [A - Airline/Carrier, B - Weather, C - National Air System, D - Security or ""]
